data.comment: Today's referee, Xavier Estrada Fernandez, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 2, Levante move into a 1-0 lead through a Oscar Duarte header.
That's a fine assist from Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Betis.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Levante a goal kick.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Betis at Ciutat de Valencia.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 12, Aissa Mandi gets an equalizer for Betis. The score is now 1-1.
Roger Marti for Levante has been booked by Xavier Estrada Fernandez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 18, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Throw-in for Betis in the half of Levante.
In the minute 21, In Valencia Betis attack through Guido Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, Jose Luis Morales is on target to give Levante a 2-1 advantage.
Dani Gomez instrumental with a fine assist.
It's now 3-1 in Valencia as Jose Luis Morales scores for Levante.
In the minute 26, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Levante's half.
Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 29, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aitor Ruibal of Betis gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In the minute 31, Can Levante capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Betis's half?
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Betis drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 34, Betis are pushing forward but Juanmi's finish is wide of the goal.
Levante have a goal kick.
Levante have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Betis to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Antonio Sanabria is on a sub for Cristian Tello for Betis.
In the minute 39, Nabil Fekir for Betis is whistled offside.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Levante, close to Betis's area.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Valencia.
Betis drive upfield and Nabil Fekir gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Levante defender.
In the minute 44, Levante drives forward and Dani Gomez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Nabil Fekir hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Betis!
In the minute 45, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Levante a goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Antonio Sanabria (Betis) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
The first half has been concluded at Ciutat de Valencia.
Jorge De Frutos Sebastian (Levante) gets a yellow card.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Levante.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Betis are whistled for offside.
In the minute 47, Levante needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Goal! Roger Marti extends Levante's lead to 4-1.
In the minute 55, Jose Luis Morales with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 59, Sergio Canales is replacing Nabil Fekir for Betis at Ciutat de Valencia.
The away team replace Juanmi with Diego Lainez.
Manuel Pellegrini is making the team's fourth substitution at Ciutat de Valencia with Paul Akouokou replacing Guido Rodriguez.
In the minute 61, Betis pushes forward through Antonio Sanabria, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Levante.
Sergio Leon is replacing Roger Marti for the home team.
In the minute 62, Levante make their second substitution with Son replacing Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Aitor Ruibal (Betis) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Manuel Pellegrini (Betis) is making a fifth substitution, with Rodri replacing Andres Guardado.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 68, He's off! Rober Pier is shown a red card.
Free kick in a good position for Betis!
The home team replace Mickael Malsa with Gonzalo Melero.
Coke (Levante) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Dani Gomez with Coke. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paco Lopez.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 75, Carlos Clerc is booked for the home team.
Betis have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Sergio Canales nets a penalty for Betis. They now trail 4-2.
In the minute 79, Betis are coming forward and Sergio Canales gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Levante a goal kick.
Throw-in for Betis at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Levante in the half of Betis.
Betis's Paul Akouokou has been booked in Valencia.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Levante.
In the minute 83, Free kick Levante.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Levante needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Sergio Canales pulls one back for Betis to make it 4-3.
Great play from Juan Miranda to set up the goal.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Giorgi Kochorashvili is on a sub for Jose Luis Morales for Levante.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Valencia.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Levante, close to Betis's area.
Goal kick for Betis at Ciutat de Valencia.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Valencia.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Corner awarded to Betis.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Lainez for Betis drives towards goal at Ciutat de Valencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-3.
At Ciutat de Valencia, Aissa Mandi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
